s2.title: Creating a Document
s2.p: Use the following code to create a document with a given document element. A xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" attribute is added to the document element.

p.source: Document document = DocumentHelper.createDocument( "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "svg:svg", null); // no document type

s2.title: Reading a document from a file
Writing a document from a file
s2.p: Use the following code to write a document to a file. The INDENT output property of the transformer is set to "yes".

s2.title: Creating a NamespaceHelper
s2.p: Create a namespace helper with a new document:

p.source: NamespaceHelper helper = new NamespaceHelper( "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", // namespace URI "svg", // prefix "svg"); // local name of document element

s2.p: Create a namespace helper for an existing document:

p.source: Document document = ...; NamespaceHelper helper = new NamespaceHelper( "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", // namespace URI "svg", // prefix document); // document

s2.title: Creating Elements
s2.p: Create an element containing a text node:

p.source: // create <svg:text>Hello World!</svg:text> element Element element = helper.createElement("text", "Hello World!");
